House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to postpone the imposition of the Federal tobacco excise tax with respect to imported, unpackaged tobacco products.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit unpackaged imported tobacco products and cigarette papers and tubes to be released from customs custody for delivery to a manufacturer of such items without payment of the tobacco excise tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to postpone the imposition of the Federal tobacco excise tax with respect to imported, unpackaged tobacco products.
